comments.content: I'm not quite sure if it is within the focus of Nova to clean up the hypervisor's logging artifacts. I tend to say "no", but I'd like to have another opinion here.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: use virsh create vm.xml and virsh destroy vm-name, the problem appear.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~huanghuayong

comments.content:
Agree with Markus that it's not the focus of Nova.  It's an operation issue. 
It seems that you used up inode. Could you run 'df -i'  under /var/log/qemu?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhenzan-zhou
